main.name: Pranali Deogade
main.jobDescription: having major in Computer and Information System
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, and a passion for coding. Having completion of Bachelors in Computer Science, I pursued my first development job to kick off my career. I was hired as a software developer by Persistent System Ltd, India.
main.contactmessage: Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.degree: Masters in Computer Science and Informaton System
education.description: Here I achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.

While here, I studied Computer  Technology, a 4 year lead-in to a Bachelors of Computer Science. This was a very hands-on experience focused more on building projects than general theory. Here I built database structures for fictional companies, created small video games, hand-coded Space Invaders from scratch in Assembly Language, built and coded an Arduino Robot to navigate obstacle courses, a lot of Java and C++ programming for data structures, and much more.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: Meteor JS
skills.description: I enjoy MeteorJS for it's ease of configuration and its ability to get a full stack prototype up and running quickly. I used MeteorJS in a team for a Startup Programming class in UVIC in conjunction with React to build the MVP for Smirkspace (below in portfolio)

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Pranali on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. She is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Pranali excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until she solves the problem at hand.
testimonials.user: Vaibhav Thorat - Web Developer at Persistent System Ltd, India
